item.title: teaching material
item.description: courses and material this year I have supervised bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on the following papers: Vichi and Kiers (2001) Bluszcz (2016) the last two years I taught pratical classes during the Statistics for the Master of Science in Development Economics and International Cooperation at Torvergata University of Rome material: one; two; three; ans one; ans two; ans three this year I taught pratical classes during the Statistics course for bsc students at LUISS University of Rome material: one; two; three; four this year I did SAS labs for the Business Statistics course for bsc students at Torvergata University of Rome material: one; two; three; four last year I taught the Preparatory Course in Statistics for the msc courses in European Economy and Business Law at Torvergata University of Rome material: one; two; three; four; five
